purpose: Facilitates the creation and management of AI agents that can leverage multiple LLMs for diverse tasks.
principle: Utilizes a modular architecture to allow agents to interact with various LLMs, supporting cross-compatibility and dynamic task assignment.
reusability: Offers a flexible API for integrating with different LLMs, enabling developers to build custom AI agents with ease.
limitations: May require specific configurations for optimal performance with different LLMs; limited documentation on advanced usage scenarios.
name: nagato-ai
highlight: Enables seamless integration and orchestration of multiple large language models (LLMs) for complex AI agent tasks.
